title: The Ruby Eye of the Monkey-God

sources.title: The Ruby Eye of the Monkey-God (1969)
sources.description: A princess and a boy, along with their two animal friends, outwit a wizard and return a ruby back to an idol in order to help a guard transformed into a monkey. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-ruby-eye-of-the-monkey-god-1969/

metadata.Plot: A princess and a boy, along with their two animal friends, outwit a wizard and return a ruby back to an idol in order to help a guard transformed into a monkey.
metadata.Writer: Cal Howard, Chris Jenkyns, Bob Ogle
